thread.title: 21st Annual Meadow Brook Runs

title: 21st Annual Meadow Brook Runs
text: Detailed Description Yes, it's more than a race - it's a Christmas party! You are cordially invited to attend the 21st Annual Meadow Brook Runs on Saturday, December 19, 2015 AD. Start time for the 5K is 9 AM, 10 AM for the 1 mile Fun Run. Walkers and pets on leash welcome. The expected field is about 300. Pre-registrants are promised a race tee shirt, so please mail Entry Forms by Friday, December 11th. A printable Entry Form and prior years' results are available at www.meadowbrookruns.org. An entry form will be faxed to any local number on request. Please make your tax deductible check to: JESUS Video Project of Alabama. Voluntary donation, $15-25 min. suggested. USAmeriBank, Meadowbrook Branch, will again host our fine race headquarters facilities; "Best Swag in a Bag" gift bags will contain valuable free coupons from favorite area merchants; Love Birds will be released in special memory of Ellis Porch and Richard Tankersley; Norton's will provide Flowers For Finishers; plus a wonderful Christmas gift drawing after the races, courtesy of our many generous sponsors. Come hungry to enjoy the great "Taste of 280" offerings from: The Fresh Market, Papa John's, Publix, Golden Flake, Bud's Best Cookies, Buffalo Rock, Smoothie King, and Starbucks. Complimentary registration is offered to local Race Directors, BTC officers, BTC Committee chairpersons, and to all our 200 sponsors. Thanks for all you do! The USAmeriBank Meadowbrook Branch, registration, start and finish lines are located 3.3 miles from I-459 on Hwy 280 East, at 1100 Corporate Parkway, Birmingham, AL 35242. Day-of-race late registration will begin Saturday morning at 7:30 AM on the patio behind USAmeriBank, Meadowbrook Branch. Picking up your tee shirt and gift bag early on race day will make sure you have what you need. You expect more in Meadow Brook, and you get it. Come jingle your bells with us this Christmas on Birmingham's most beautiful course! Bob Cosby, M. D., Race Director 3508 Cheshire Drive
